```{r}
#| echo: false
# source: Danielle Navarro (https://github.com/djnavarro/djnavarro.github.io/blob/main/index.qmd)
add_card <- function(src = NULL, title = NULL, text = NULL, url = NULL, link_text = NULL, img_alt = NULL) {
  lines <- c(
    '<div class="g-col-12 g-col-md-4 g-col-xl-4">',
    '<div class="card h-100">',
    paste0(
      '<a href="', 
      url, 
      '"><img src="', 
      src, 
      '"',
      'alt = "',
      img_alt,
      '"',
      'class="card-img-top card-img-medium"></a>'
    ),
    '<div class="card-body">',
    paste0('<a href="', url,'">', '<button class="btn btn-outline-primary w-100">', title, '<i class="fa-solid fa-arrow-right-to-bracket"></i></button></a>'),
    '</div>',
    '</div>',
    '</div>'
  )
  cat(lines, sep="\n")
}
```
